item.title: Chase Sapphire Reserve cardholders: Register to earn a 5,000-point Aeroplan flight reward
item.description: Your Chase Sapphire Reserve card can score you a flight reward credit worth 5,000 points to use on your next Aeroplan redemption. Here's how.
